speaker: Commission Board
lines: You read notices tacked over older notices.
A rough dragon sketch marks a hard job.
Someone wrote 'pay in stew' under a simple repair.
The smith's stamp marks the safe commissions.
You can earn coin or favor here.
You reach for a task and make up your mind.

choices.text: Take the east road guard brace (fight).
Forge nails until the slate smiles (grit).
